data.title: Marshall Brickman Biography
data.meta_description: Read all about Marshall Brickman with TV Guide's exclusive biography including their list of awards, celeb facts and more at TV Guide.
data.text:
Awards

1980BAFTA Film Awards-Best Screenplay: winner

1979Oscar-Best Writing (Screenplay Written Directly for the Screen): nominated

1978BAFTA Film Awards-Best Screenplay: winner

1978Writers Guild Awards-Original Comedy: winner

1977Oscar-Best Writing (Screenplay Written Directly for the Screen--based on factual material or on story material not previously published or produced): winner

1977Los Angeles Film Critics Association-Best Screenplay: winner

1974Writers Guild Awards-Original Comedy: nominated
